history.proof: intros t. induction t. - reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite -> IHt. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite -> IHt. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite -> IHt1. rewrite -> IHt2. reflexivity.

chat.content:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
empty: A
============================
forall t : pbtree A, all_leaves (to_btree t) = all_pbleaves t

Related definitions and lemmas:
all_pbleaves : forall A : Type, pbtree A -> list A
to_btree = fix to_btree (a : pbtree A) : btree A := match a with | pbleaf b => leaf b | pbleft l1 | pbright l1 => to_btree l1 | pbnode l1 l2 => node (to_btree l1) (to_btree l2) end : pbtree A -> btree A
all_leaves : forall A : Type, btree A -> list A
Inductive pbtree (A : Type) : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree A | pbleft : pbtree A -> pbtree A | pbright : pbtree A -> pbtree A | pbnode : pbtree A -> pbtree A -> pbtree A Arguments pbtree _%type_scope Arguments pbleaf [A]%type_scope Arguments pbleft [A]%type_scope Arguments pbright [A]%type_scope Arguments pbnode [A]%type_scope
pbtree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : pbtree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
inpb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : pbtree A, {inpb a b} + {~ inpb a b}
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
weight_tree_compute : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> (forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t) m) = weight_tree f t
frequency_list_unique : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A), unique_key (frequency_list eqA_dec l)
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
restrict_code_unique_key : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), unique_key (restrict_code eqA_dec m c)
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
restrict_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> code A
in_alphabet_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (m : list A) (c : code A), {in_alphabet m c} + {~ in_alphabet m c}
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
number_of_occurrences_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
add_frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list (A * nat) -> list (A * nat)
restrict_code_encode_length : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (c : code A), encode eqA_dec c m = encode eqA_dec (restrict_code eqA_dec m c) m
correct_encoding : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A), unique_prefix c -> not_null c -> forall m : list A, in_alphabet m c -> decode c (encode eqA_dec c m) = m
find_code_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (c1 c2 : code A), permutation c1 c2 -> unique_prefix c1 -> find_code eqA_dec a c1 = find_code eqA_dec a c2
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c
number_of_occurrences_permutation_ex : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (a : A), exists m1 : list A, permutation m (id_list a (number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) ++ m1) /\ ~ In a m1
find_code_correct2 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (l : list bool), unique_key c -> In (a, l) c -> find_code eqA_dec a c = l
restrict_code_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (a : A) (c : code A), In a m -> find_code eqA_dec a c = find_code eqA_dec a (restrict_code eqA_dec m c)
not_in_find_code : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * list bool)), (forall p : list bool, ~ In (a, p) l) -> find_code eqA_dec a l = nil

intros t. induction t.
- reflexivity.

- simpl. rewrite -> IHt. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite -> IHt1. rewrite -> IHt2. reflexivity.
